meanings.definition: Constituting number ten in a sequence.
meanings.sent1: She was the tenth person in line for the ride.
meanings.sent2: The tenth book on the shelf caught her eye.
meanings.sent3: The tenth cupcake was too pretty to eat.
meanings.sent4: His tenth attempt at the puzzle finally succeeded.
meanings.sent5: The tenth star in the sky twinkled brightly.

meanings.definition: One of ten equal parts of a whole.
meanings.sent1: He ate a tenth of the pizza all by himself.
meanings.sent2: The team won by a tenth of a second.
meanings.sent3: The tenth of the cake mysteriously disappeared.
meanings.sent4: She felt like a tenth of her usual self after the long hike.
meanings.sent5: A tenth of the garden was filled with colorful flowers.

meanings.definition: The ordinal number corresponding to ten.
meanings.sent1: Her birthday falls on the tenth of July.
meanings.sent2: He came in tenth place in the race.
meanings.sent3: The tenth in line for ice cream got the last scoop.
meanings.sent4: The tenth chapter of the book revealed a surprising twist.
meanings.sent5: The tenth row of seats offered the best view of the stage.
